title: Quantum Mechanical Embedding of Spinning Particle and Induced Spin-connection
abstract: This paper introduces the way of the embedding of spinning particle quantum mechanically. Schr\"odinger equation on its submanifold obtains the gauge field as spin connection, and it reduces to the ones obtained by Ohnuki and Kitakado when we consider $S^2$ in $R^3$. PACS numbers: 03.65
